content: Using FHIR - what might you do to find ANY Advanced Directives in an EHR? Fully Structured or not?

At this point Advance Directives are very difficult due to the wide Range of types. So, doing a wideband search for any AD would not be easy to do and would require a fair amount of work. Technically, all would require some kind of legal agreement, so searching on Contract (assuming that's how the system supports) may work
(which is what you're more likely to find near-term)
